trends: There has been one other sighting in Hamilton City
There were no other sightings in Hamilton City on or around February 12th 2012
Summary: predwan craft, large, hovering, when I got out of car and whistled loudly and waved i silently moved off to SW still just above tree tops
divs: sighting detailspredawn leaving property in a wooded area on sacramento river saw what at first i assumed was a helocopter b\c it was hovering. although it had many more ights than a copter and all around, above and below, with several colors, which i don't exacty recall now, white, blue i recall for sure, perhaps 12 or so lights total. it was shaped not unlike a football but less accentuated "ends," it appeared to be symetrical fron to back top to bottom, although oblong. i jumped from car when i realized not a copter (we have copters for field chemical applications out here)and whistled and waved. it then moved off silently toward the sw at a speed of about 20 mph or so, still noiseless. i have tried to fit this in a know craft behavior, but i can't, so i give up and am reporting now. i can't say why i whistled and waved, except that it was close enough, although still dark out, to see it was solid, close and big and i whistled while it was hovering. i felt it began to move away after that, it felt like it was in response to my curiosity and had i not jumped out may have had a longer witness. hard to imagine an alien craft and yet i can't think of any known craft we have that behaves like that. i want to think it was a helicopter, but it just doesn't fit visually or in it's silence.
